top_reviews.title: Initially you will feel great using it but after a month it will start ...
top_reviews.body: Initially you will feel great using it but after a month it will start tearing up from the stitches. I recommend don’t buy itRead more
top_reviews.body_html:
Initially you will feel great using it but after a month it will start tearing up from the stitches. I recommend don’t buy it

top_reviews.title: Stay away
top_reviews.body: Offers a good driving experience but the quality leaves a lot to be desired. Less than a month later, the stitching is coming apart, the material shows just how flimsy it really is by peeling off from the edges. And to think I turned down a local dealer who offered a leather grip for 500. Not recommended.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Offers a good driving experience but the quality leaves a lot to be desired. Less than a month later, the stitching is coming apart, the material shows just how flimsy it really is by peeling off from the edges. And to think I turned down a local dealer who offered a leather grip for 500. Not recommended.

top_reviews.title: Not worth the value at all!
top_reviews.body: Look and fit for i20 was good but product didn't even last for 2 months. Cover is cut from where stiches are and inside foam is coming out of it.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Look and fit for i20 was good but product didn't even last for 2 months. Cover is cut from where stiches are and inside foam is coming out of it.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Worth a buy
top_reviews.body: I have ordered this steering cover for my Baleno and the cover has fitted correctly without any suffer to my hands or to the cover :)  Coming to the quality of the product it is an OK product for this price range and worth a try if you are looking in this price change.  Will brief in a long term review about the durability of the product as on today the product is just one day and I can't comment on the quality and durability now.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I have ordered this steering cover for my Baleno and the cover has fitted correctly without any suffer to my hands or to the cover :)

Coming to the quality of the product it is an OK product for this price range and worth a try if you are looking in this price change.

Will brief in a long term review about the durability of the product as on today the product is just one day and I can't comment on the quality and durability now.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Not quality product and not worth buying
top_reviews.body: I am writing the review after using for one month, initially it looks good to the car, proud feeling as it is stylish. After one month the real truth comes out, cloth will start peeling of and looks awkward in our car because the broken pieces of cloth looks like teared cloth. I don't drive too much and drive softly and Also I park my car in shadows always this rule out sun light effect also.  Final conclusion: if you want to showoff for one month, u can go for it.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I am writing the review after using for one month, initially it looks good to the car, proud feeling as it is stylish. After one month the real truth comes out, cloth will start peeling of and looks awkward in our car because the broken pieces of cloth looks like teared cloth. I don't drive too much and drive softly and Also I park my car in shadows always this rule out sun light effect also.

Final conclusion: if you want to showoff for one month, u can go for it.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Grip with Style!
top_reviews.body: Purchased for : Rs. 599/-  Bought it for my Tata IndiGo Ecs Car. Cover fitted perfectly with ease. (Started from top to bottom). Looks very Sporty! Drove approx. 35 kms with it within city roads & it was a comfortable drive. It's a Soft cover with all round cushion padding, making the overall driving a smooth experience.  Conclusion: I prefer soft covers & this ticked all the right boxes for me as it matched my car interiors perfectly, enhancing the Overall look of my Car. Comfort & Grip is top-notch. Recommended!Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Purchased for : Rs. 599/-

Bought it for my Tata IndiGo Ecs Car.
Cover fitted perfectly with ease. (Started from top to bottom).
Looks very Sporty!
Drove approx. 35 kms with it within city roads & it was a comfortable drive.
It's a Soft cover with all round cushion padding, making the overall driving a smooth experience.

Conclusion: I prefer soft covers & this ticked all the right boxes for me as it matched my car interiors perfectly, enhancing the Overall look of my Car.
Comfort & Grip is top-notch.
Recommended!
Read more

top_reviews.title: Mixed feelings..lookwise its nice.
top_reviews.body: Have installed this on my Hyundai Venue. Really enhance the visual beauty of ur cabin. Quality and stitching is not that great. If u regularly use the car dont go for it ,will definitely tear over regular usage.  Wil update my review if mine tear.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Have installed this on my Hyundai Venue. Really enhance the visual beauty of ur cabin. Quality and stitching is not that great. If u regularly use the car dont go for it ,will definitely tear over regular usage.

Wil update my review if mine tear.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Not suggested
top_reviews.body: I have been using this for a while now in my Skoda rapid. It gave a premium look and good hold. However, it creates a mark on the steering wheel and the inner quality is Very poor. The white layer of this product gets stick to the steering and damaged the original layer. I had to hard clean to get this rubbed away.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I have been using this for a while now in my Skoda rapid. It gave a premium look and good hold. However, it creates a mark on the steering wheel and the inner quality is Very poor. The white layer of this product gets stick to the steering and damaged the original layer. I had to hard clean to get this rubbed away.
